entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:22 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -0.9°C
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or light snow changing to rain showers and freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 09:45 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
